entries.name: Age
entries: Jordponnyer blir vuxna vid 18 års ålder och kan leva upp till ett knappt sekel.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: De flesta jordponnyer tenderar att vara bra, även om de utanför den himmelska läran varierar kraftigt.

entries.name: Size
entries: Jordponnyer är mellan en och två meter långa. Din storlek är Medium.

entries.name: Powerful Build
entries: Du räknas som en storlek större när du fastställer din bärförmåga och den vikt du kan skjuta, dra eller lyfta.

entries.name: Down to Earth
entries: Du vet från början när du går in i eller är nära ett annat plan, illusoriskt land eller nekrotiskt fenomen. Under din första vecka där får du fördelarna med Alert Feat. När du går på land vet du dessutom upp till 60 fot om det finns en grotta/öppning under dig.

entries.name: Cutiemark
entries: Du lär dig ett valfritt språk eller kan bli skicklig i en valfri färdighet eller ett valfritt verktyg.

entries.name: Languages
entries: Du kan tala, läsa och skriva på det gemensamma språket.

entries.name: Salt Block
entries: Du kan fokusera dig själv så att du ibland kan avvärja skador. När du tar skada kan du använda din reaktion för att kasta en d12. Lägg till din konstitutionsmodifierare till det antal som kastas och minska skadan med den summan. När du har använt den här egenskapen kan du inte använda den igen förrän du har avslutat en kort eller lång vila.

entries.name: Unique Destiny
entries: Du får en {@5etools feat|feats.html} av ditt val och istället för +1 till alla förmågor får du +1 till två unika förmågor.

entries.name: Age
entries: Pegasi blir vuxna vid 25 års ålder och kan leva upp till ett knappt sekel.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: De flesta Pegasi tenderar att vara goda, även om de som befinner sig utanför den himmelska läran varierar kraftigt.

entries.name: Size
entries: Pegasai är mellan en och två meter höga. Din storlek är Medium.

entries.name: Born from the Sky
entries: Du får färdighet i {@skill Acrobatics} eller {@skill Sleight of Hand}

entries.name: Cloud Walker
entries: Får behandla alla moln som fasta moln

entries.name: Pegasai Agility
entries: Du kan fördubbla din rörelse en gång per strid som en fri handling.

entries.name: Cutiemark
entries: Du lär dig ett valfritt språk eller kan bli skicklig i en valfri färdighet eller ett valfritt verktyg.

entries.name: Languages
entries: Du kan tala, läsa och skriva på det gemensamma språket.

entries.name: Downdraft
entries: Dina vingar ger ifrån sig en kraftig vindpust, som en bonusåtgärd kan du välja att dra ner en måltavla under dig. När de befinner sig i din downdraft halveras deras rörelsehastighet och distansattacker görs med nackdel fram till början av deras nästa tur.

entries.name: Dash Dancing
entries: Din smidighet är oöverträffad jämfört med andra. När en varelse som du kan se träffar dig med en anfallsrulle kan du använda din reaktion för att tvinga den varelsen att göra en ny rulle. När du har använt den här förmågan kan du inte använda den igen förrän du har avslutat en kort eller lång vila.

entries.name: Age
entries: Enhörningar blir vuxna vid 43 års ålder och kan leva upp till två århundraden, men det har förekommit att de lever längre.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: De flesta enhörningar tenderar att vara goda, även om de utanför den himmelska läran varierar kraftigt.

entries.name: Size
entries: Enhörningar är mellan 1 och 2 meter långa (med horn). Din storlek är Medium.

entries.name: Innate Magic
entries: Du känner till mage hand cantrip, och handen är osynlig när du utför cantripet med den här egenskapen.

entries.name: Magically Gifted
entries: Du kan en trollkonst från trollkarlslistan som du själv väljer. Du använder din intelligensmodifierare för denna besvärjelse.

entries.name: Cunning
entries: En gång per kort vila kan du ha en fördel på intelligens- eller visdomssparande kast mot magi.

entries.name: Cutiemark
entries: Du lär dig ett valfritt språk eller kan bli skicklig i en valfri färdighet eller ett valfritt verktyg.

entries.name: Languages
entries: Du kan tala, läsa och skriva på det gemensamma språket.

entries.name: High Magic
entries: Som en bonusåtgärd kan du magiskt teleportera dig upp till 30 fot till ett obebott utrymme som du kan se. När du har använt den här egenskapen kan du inte göra det igen förrän du avslutar en lång vila. Från och med 3:e nivån får du också motstånd mot all skada när du teleporterar med hjälp av denna egenskap. Motståndet varar fram till början av din nästa tur. Under den tiden framstår du som spöklik och genomskinlig.

entries.name: Knowledge Domain
entries: Med en färdighet som du är duktig på kan du välja att finslipa dina färdigheter med den och få expertis i den färdigheten.

entries.name: Age
entries: Kristallponnyer blir vuxna vid 58 års ålder och kan leva upp till tre hundra år, men det har förekommit att de lever längre.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: De flesta kristallponnyer har ingen särskild ideologi eftersom de har varit isolerade hela sitt liv.

entries.name: Size
entries: Crystal Ponies är mellan en och två meter höga. Din storlek är Medium.

entries.name: Flying Shards
entries: En gång per vändning när du träffas av en närstridsattack sprängs skärvor utåt mot angriparen och orsakar 1d4+Con genomträngande skada.

entries.name: Crystal Form
entries: Du kan dra dig tillbaka till din kristallform som en åtgärd. Tills du kommer ut ur den får du en +4 bonus på AC, och du har fördel på räddningskast på styrka och konstitution. När du är i denna form är du liggande, din hastighet är 0 och kan inte öka, du har nackdel på räddningskast på Dexterity, du kan inte ta reaktioner, och den enda handling du kan ta är en bonushandling för att komma ut ur din Crystal.

entries.name: Cutiemark
entries: Du lär dig ett valfritt språk eller kan bli skicklig i en valfri färdighet eller ett valfritt verktyg.

entries.name: Languages
entries: Du kan tala, läsa och skriva på det gemensamma språket.

entries.name: Earth Pony
entries: En gång per lång vila kan du göra en ny kontroll av en färdighet som du är duktig på.

entries.name: Pegasus
entries: Du får en flyghastighet på 30 fot.

entries.name: Unicorn
entries: Du lär dig besvärjelsen Ice Knife som är omformad till Crystal Knife. Du kan använda den här förmågan upp till din konstitutionsmodifierare (minst 1). Du måste ta en kort eller lång vila för att återfå användningsområden.

entries.name: Mark of Sombra
entries: När du befinner dig i mörkret kan du spendera 1 minut på att meditera på marken och låta mörkret ta över dig. När detta är slutfört är du osynlig tills ett starkt ljus lyser på dig. Du är också skicklig i Stealth, Deception eller Intimidation. Svavelstenshorn börjar växa från ditt huvud.

entries.name: Mark of Love
entries: Om en allierad inom 15 fot från dig skulle sjunka till 0 hp kan du välja att använda din reaktion och halvera din nuvarande hp nedåt avrundat och läka dem för det förlorade antalet hp. Du kan bara göra detta en gång per lång vila.

entries.name: Mark of Crystals
entries: Dina kristaller hårdnar och blir rikligare, du får +1 AC och skadan av Flying Shards ökar till 1d6+Con. Längs din kropp börjar kristaller sticka ut i en grov, kuperad form.

entries.name: Age
entries: Testraler blir vuxna vid 18 års ålder och kan leva upp till 80 år.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Testraler tenderar att inte ha någon särskild inriktning. De bästa och de sämsta finns bland dem.

entries.name: Size
entries: Testraler är mellan en och två meter höga. Din storlek är Medium.

entries.name: Darkvision
entries: Du kan se 60 fot in i mörkret.

entries.name: Bite
entries: Ditt huggtandsgrimma är ett naturligt vapen som du kan använda för att göra obeväpnade slag. Om du träffar med det, ger du piercing damage lika med 1d6 + din styrka-modifierare istället för bludgeoning damage normalt för ett obeväpnat slag.

entries.name: Vampiric Past
entries: I strid kan du kasta dig in i ett våldsamt matningsraseri. Som en bonusåtgärd kan du göra en specialattack med ditt bett. Om attacken träffar utdelar den sin normala skada och du får tillfälliga träffpoäng som är lika med din Damage + Constitution-modifierare (minst 1), och du kan inte använda den här egenskapen igen förrän du har avslutat en kort eller lång vila.

entries.name: Sunlight Sensitivity
entries: Du har nackdel på visdomskontroller (perception) som bygger på synen när du, målet eller vad du försöker uppfatta befinner dig i direkt solljus. Detta kan negeras av speciella glasögon, huvor eller solglasögon.

entries.name: Cutiemark
entries: Du lär dig ett valfritt språk eller kan bli skicklig i en valfri färdighet eller ett valfritt verktyg.

entries.name: Languages
entries: Du kan tala, läsa och skriva battiska. De som är en del av den himmelska undervisningen kan tala, läsa och skriva Common.

entries.name: Shadow Warrior
entries: Du får egenskapen Skulker.

entries.name: Night Warrior
entries: När du befinner dig under jord eller när det är natt får du två gånger per kort vila en fördel på attackkast. En gång per lång vila när du kastar 19 eller 20 räknas det som kritiskt.

entries.name: Blood Chalice
entries: Du kan använda Vampiric Past ytterligare en gång per kort vila och de tillfälliga träffpunkterna fördubblas.

entries.name: Age
entries: Griffonerna blir vuxna vid 20 års ålder och kan leva upp till knappt hundra år.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Griffonerna tenderar att vara neutrala och onda. Griffonerna är barbariska och en girig ras.

entries.name: Size
entries: Griffonerna är mellan 1 och 2 meter höga. Din storlek är Medium.

entries.name: Proud Ancestry
entries: Du får färdighet i {@skill History}.

entries.name: Eye of Nylea
entries: Tack vare ditt Griffonblod har du en överlägsen syn i mörker och svaga förhållanden. Du kan se i svagt ljus inom 60 fot från dig som om det vore starkt ljus, och i mörker som om det vore svagt ljus. Du kan inte urskilja färg i mörker, bara grå nyanser.

entries.name: Relentless Endurance
entries: När du har minskat till 0 träffpunkter men inte dödats direkt kan du istället minska till 1 träffpunkt. Du kan inte använda den här funktionen igen förrän du avslutar en lång vila.

entries.name: Nylea's Gift
entries: Du behärskar {@item longsword|phb}, {@item shortsword|phb}, {@item shortbow|phb} och {@item longbow|phb}.

entries.name: Aggressive
entries: Som en bonusåtgärd kan du förflytta dig upp till din hastighet mot en valfri fiende som du kan se eller höra. Du måste avsluta denna rörelse närmare fienden än du började. Du kan göra detta upp till din dexterity-modifierare (Minst 1) per lång vila.

entries.name: Forceful Negotiator
entries: Du har en fördel på Intimidationskast när du försöker sänka priserna.

entries.name: Languages
entries: Du kan tala, läsa och skriva Griffic. De som är en del av den himmelska undervisningen kan tala, läsa och skriva Common.

entries.name: Wary of the World
entries: Istället för +2 styrka får du +2 visdom. Du har fördel mot en osynlig fälla en gång per lång vila.

entries.name: Primal Berserk
entries: Du kan välja att ha fördel på ditt startkast, men den första fienden har fördel mot dig i en runda.

entries.name: Call of Nylea
entries: Som en bonusåtgärd kan du kalla ditt skott till Nylea. Med nackdel kan du bestämma var du träffar ditt mål och med hennes välsignelse får du en av följande effekter:

items: {@b Wings:} Målet måste göra ett räddningskast för koncentration, om målet misslyckas förlorar de omedelbart sin flygförmåga i 1d4 varv.
{@b Chest:} Målet måste göra ett räddningskast på 12 från konstitutionen.Om målet misslyckas drabbas de av en punkt av utmattning.Du kan bara göra detta en gång per mål.
{@b Arms:} Målet släpper sitt vapen som det håller i handen.
{@b Head:} -2 till attackkast. Du ger 1 d6 extra skada (skadetyp beror på vapnet).
{@b Legs:} Målets hastighet minskas med hälften i en runda.
Du kan använda din förmåga Called Shot lika mycket som din kompetensbonus, efter en lång vila återfår du dina användningsområden.

entries.name: Age
entries: Hippogriffs blir vuxna vid 18 års ålder och kan leva upp till 60 år, men de som föds som drottning kan leva upp till två hundra år.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: De flesta kristallponnyer har ingen särskild ideologi eftersom de har varit isolerade hela sitt liv.

entries.name: Size
entries: Flodhästar är mellan 2 och 4 fot höga. Oavsett din längd är din storlek Medium.

entries.name: Pearl of Transmogrify
entries: Som en åtgärd kan du förvandla dig från en Sea Pony till en Hippogriff eller tillbaka igen.

entries.name: Seapony Form
entries: Du får en simhastighet på 30 fot och kan andas luft och vatten. Din gånghastighet sjunker till 10 fot och du förlorar din flyghastighet.

entries.name: Hippogriff Form
entries: Du får en flyghastighet på 30 ft.

entries.name: Seaquestrian College
entries: Du kan två valfria musikinstrument eller ett instrument och ett verktyg.

entries.name: Melody of Power
entries: Med ditt valda instrument kan du manifestera musikalisk energi medan du spelar. Du kan använda den här förmågan upp till din färdighetsbonus, varefter du inte kan använda den här funktionen igen förrän du avslutar en lång vila.  Välj ett av följande alternativ:

items: {@b Rally:} Inom 30 fot kan du dela din reaktion med en annan vänskaplig varelse.
{@b Riff:} Under en kort vila kan du välja att spela ett riff, alla inom 15 fot kastar med fördel för en träffdocka.
{@b Accelerando:} Genom att använda din åtgärd kan du öka hastigheten på Melody of Power och ge dig tredubbel rörelsehastighet, hopphöjd och avstånd. Detta varar tills slutet av din tur.

{@b Rallentando:} Genom att använda din handling kan du projicera en sex meter lång kon av musikalisk melodi. De som fångas av Rallentando måste göra ett DC 12 Dexterity Saving Throw, på ett misslyckat räddningskast har målet sin rörelsehastighet reducerad med hälften.

entries.name: Languages
entries: Du kan tala, läsa och skriva Seppo. De som är en del av den himmelska undervisningen kan tala, läsa och skriva Common.

entries.name: Signature Instrument
entries: Välj ett av dina instrument som du äger och behärskar, det här föremålet betraktas nu som magiskt och kan frammanas som en bonusåtgärd oavsett var det befinner sig. Skulle detta föremål gå sönder kommer du mystiskt att hitta det efter 1 vecka på ett överraskande ställe.

entries.name: Seaponian Fammiliar
entries: Du spenderar 15 minuter på att skapa en ritual, när ritualen är klar har du en immateriell bekant som bara du kan interagera och röra vid. Den bekanta kan ses av andra om du väljer att tillåta det, annars är den osynlig för alla utom om de befinner sig på det eteriska planet. Denna familiar kan vara vilket vattendjur som helst men är skalat ner till 3ft eller mindre (ditt val), familiar kan lagra ett föremål av vilken storlek som helst så länge det är under 30lbs och du kan bara ha en familiar åt gången. Besvärjelser som Dispel Magic kommer att få den bekanta att försvinna och släppa föremålet, om det finns något, på marken direkt under den.

entries.name: Seaponian Healer
entries: Du får egenskapen Healer och är skicklig i medicin.

entries.name: Age
entries: Zebror blir vuxna vid 18 års ålder och kan leva upp till 80 år.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Zebror tenderar att inte ha någon särskild inriktning. De bästa och de sämsta finns bland dem.

entries.name: Size
entries: Zebror är mellan en och två meter höga. Din storlek är Medium.

entries.name: Masters of Alchemy
entries: Du får färdighet i ett av följande: Alchemists förnödenheter, Brewer's förnödenheter eller Poisoner's Kit.

entries.name: Speech of Beast and Leaf
entries: Du har förmågan att kommunicera på ett begränsat sätt med djur och växter. De kan förstå innebörden av dina ord, även om du inte har någon särskild förmåga att förstå dem i gengäld. Du har fördel på alla Charismakontroller du gör för att påverka dem.

entries.name: Cunning Artisan
entries: Under en kort vila kan du skörda ben och skinn från ett dräpt djur, en konstrukt, en drake, en monstrositet eller en växtvarelse av storlek liten eller större för att skapa ett av följande föremål: en sköld, en klubba, ett spjut eller 1d4 pilar för blåspistolnålar. För att använda den här egenskapen behöver du ett blad, till exempel en dolk, eller lämpliga hantverksverktyg, till exempel läderhantverksverktyg.

entries.name: Jungle Kin
entries: Din grundläggande gånghastighet ökar till 35 fot när du befinner dig i tunga lövverk/skog/jungel.

entries.name: Mask of the Wild
entries: Du kan försöka gömma dig även när du bara är lätt skymd av lövverk, kraftigt regn, fallande snö, dimma och andra naturfenomen.

entries.name: Cutiemark
entries: Du lär dig ett valfritt språk eller kan bli skicklig i en valfri färdighet eller ett valfritt verktyg.

entries.name: Languages
entries: Du kan tala, läsa och skriva zebrack. De som är en del av Celestial läror kan tala, läsa och skriva Common.

entries.name: Born in the Wild
entries: Du är naturligt immun mot sjukdomar och förgiftning.

entries.name: Potent Supplies
entries: Kostnaden för det material som krävs halveras för din valda färdighet med.

entries.name: Age
entries: Hjortar blir vuxna vid 43 års ålder och kan leva upp till två hundra år.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: De flesta hjortar har ingen särskild ideologi eftersom de har varit isolerade i hela sitt liv.

entries.name: Size
entries: Deer range widely from 3 to 6 feet tall. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Forest Kin
entries: Your base walking speed increases to 40 feet while in heavy foliage/forest/jungle.

entries.name: Mask of the Wild
entries: Du kan försöka gömma dig även när du bara är lätt skymd av lövverk, kraftigt regn, fallande snö, dimma och andra naturfenomen.

entries.name: Nature's Guardians
entries: Du behärskar {@item longsword|phb}, {@item shortsword|phb}, {@item shortbow|phb} och {@item longbow|phb}.

entries.name: Speech of Beast and Leaf
entries: You have the ability to communicate in a limited manner with beasts and plants. They can understand the meaning of your words, though you have no special ability to understand them in return.

entries.name: Nature's Attunement
entries: You have proficiency with Nature.

entries.name: Languages
entries: Du kan tala, läsa och skriva på det gemensamma språket.

entries.name: Way of the Dryad
entries: Your people are naturally friendly with Dryads. You know the Druidcraft spell, and have expertise with nature.

entries.name: Way of the Bear
entries: Your people are naturally friendly to the animals that reside in the forest. You know the Animal friendship spell, and you have proficiency in Animal Handling.

entries.name: Age
entries: Breezies reach adulthood at the age of 1 and can live up to 10 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Breezies are unaligned with any particular ideaology as they've been isolated their entire life.

entries.name: Size
entries: Breezies are tiny creatures where even their massive antannes and wings barely reach a foot. Your size is tiny.

entries.name: Tiny
entries: Tiny player races have special rules for weapons (unless specifically crafted for them) with the following properties:

items: Tiny races do not benefit from the Light property, so these weapons cannot be used in the off-hand for two-weapon fighting. But they are still a one-handed weapon
Versatile weapons must be wielded in two hands, and deal their basic damage rather than their versatile damage
Tiny creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls with Two-handed weapons.
Heavy weapons cannot be wielded by a Tiny races at all.
All other one-handed weapons must be wielded in two hands.
Tiny races do not benefit from the Finesse property, unless the weapon is also light.

entries.name: Grovel, Cower, and Beg
entries: As an action on your turn, you can cower pathetically to distract nearby foes. Until the end of your next turn, your allies gain advantage on attack rolls against enemies within 10 feet of you that you can see. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Natural Illusionist
entries: You know the minor illusion cantrip. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for it.

entries.name: Bugnap
entries: Your long rests are only 4 hours long, you must still be asleep to gain from this effect.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read and write Brozonian. Those who are a part of Celestial teachings can speak, read and write Common.

entries.name: Wind Strider
entries: ou can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each of your turns.

entries.name: Angry Fly
entries: When you damage a creature with an attack or a spell and the creature's size is larger than yours, you can cause the attack or spell to deal extra damage to the creature. The extra damage equals your level. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Age
entries: Kirins reach adulthood at the age of 35 and can live up to two centruies.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Most Kirins are unaligned with any particular ideaology as they've been isolated their entire life. But those who are often a Nirik live a Chaotic Evil life.

entries.name: Size
entries: Kirins range from 3 to 5 feet tall. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Transform
entries: As a bonus action you can switch from being a Kirin to a Nirik and vice versa.

entries.name: Speech of Beast and Leaf
entries: Du har förmågan att kommunicera på ett begränsat sätt med djur och växter. De kan förstå innebörden av dina ord, även om du inte har någon särskild förmåga att förstå dem i gengäld. Du har fördel på alla Charismakontroller du gör för att påverka dem.

entries.name: Kirin Form
entries: You can cast detect magic and disguise self with this trait, using Wisdom as your spellcasting ability for them. Once you cast either spell, you can't cast it again with this trait until you finish a long rest. When you use this version of disguise self, you can seem up to 3 feet shorter than normal.

entries.name: Nirik Form
entries: You are resistant to Fire damage but when you are hit with a spell like Calm Emotions you are instantly back into Kirin form and cannot change until the spell ends. In addition, you know the thaumaturgy cantrip. Once you reach 3rd level, you can cast hellish rebuke; you must finish a long rest in order to cast the spell again using this trait. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells.

entries.name: Languages
entries: Du kan tala, läsa och skriva på det gemensamma språket.

entries.name: Pact of the Mind
entries: You gain the feat Observant and you know the Mage Hand cantrip.

entries.name: Pact of the Body
entries: You gain the feat Infernal Constitution and you know the Produce Flame cantrip.

entries.name: Age
entries: Yaks reach adulthood at the age of 20 and can live up to a century.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Yaks are unaligned with any particular ideaology as they've been isolated their entire life.

entries.name: Size
entries: Yaks range from 3 to 5 feet tall. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Sure-Footed
entries: You have advantage on Strength and Dexterity Saving Throws made against effects that would knock you prone or move you

entries.name: Beast of Burden
entries: You are considered a Large animal for the purpose of determining your carrying Capacity.

entries.name: Earth Walk
entries: You can move across difficult terrain made of earth or stone without expending extra movement.

entries.name: Mountain Born
entries: You're acclimated to high altitude, including elevations above 20,000 feet. You're also naturally adapted to cold climates.

entries.name: Horns
entries: You are proficient with your horns, which are a melee weapon that deals 1d6 piercing damage. Your horns grant you advantage on all checks made to shove a creature, but not to avoid being shoved yourself.

entries.name: Destructively Clumsy
entries: As a bonus action with your horns you can choose to attack with your horns. You have disadvantage on the attack.

entries.name: Languages
entries: Du kan tala, läsa och skriva på det gemensamma språket.

entries.name: Yak is Strong
entries: Du kan fokusera dig själv så att du ibland kan avvärja skador. När du tar skada kan du använda din reaktion för att kasta en d12. Lägg till din konstitutionsmodifierare till det antal som kastas och minska skadan med den summan. När du har använt den här egenskapen kan du inte använda den igen förrän du har avslutat en kort eller lång vila.

entries.name: Yak is Best
entries: Twice per long rest you can give yourself 1d6 of inspiration to add to any attack roll, ability check or skill check.

entries.name: Yak is Wack
entries: When you are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, you can drop to 1 hit point instead. You can't use this feature again until you finish a long rest. When it is your turn you go into this rage you have advantage on attack rolls but so do your enemies against you. This effect lasts for 1 minute or until healed.

entries.name: Age
entries: Bison reach adulthood at the age of 20 and can live up to a century.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Bison are unaligned with any particular ideaology as they've been isolated their entire life.

entries.name: Size
entries: Bison range from 3 to 5 feet tall. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Beast of Burden
entries: You are considered a Large animal for the purpose of determining your carrying Capacity.

entries.name: Earth Walk
entries: You can move across difficult terrain made of earth or stone without expending extra movement.

entries.name: Trampiling Charge
entries: If you move at least 20 feet straight toward a target and you hit with your melee weapon the target must succeed on a DC 10 Strength Saving Throw or be knocked prone.

entries.name: Horns
entries: You are proficient with your horns, which are a melee weapon that deals 1d6 piercing damage. Your horns grant you advantage on all checks made to shove a creature, but not to avoid being shoved yourself.

entries.name: Languages
entries: Du kan tala, läsa och skriva på det gemensamma språket.

entries.name: Path of the Stars
entries: You can not get lost as long as you can see the stars in the sky. You also start with the a Tribal pipe. When smoked and after a long rest you and your companions gain 2d8+2 temporary hitpoints.

entries.name: Path of the Tribe
entries: You gain proficiency in religion. In addition to this whenever you make a religion check your result can not be lower than a 8 in total. You also start with a Tribal pipe. When smoked and you are on a long or short rest you and your companions gain 1d4 inspiration which can be used on an attack roll, ability check or skill check.

entries.name: Age
entries: Minotaurs reach adulthood at the age of 18 and can live up to a century.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Minotaurs typically live a neutral life.

entries.name: Size
entries: Minotaurs range from 5 to 8 feet tall. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Horns
entries: You are proficient with your horns, which are a melee weapon that deals 1d10 piercing damage. Your horns grant you advantage on all checks made to shove a creature, but not to avoid being shoved yourself.

entries.name: Goring Rush
entries: When you use the Dash action during your turn, you can make a melee attack with your horns as a bonus action.

entries.name: Hammering Horns
entries: When you use the Attack action during your turn to make a melee attack, you can attempt to shove a creature with your horns as a bonus action. You cannot use this shove attempt to knock a creature prone.

entries.name: Intimidating Presence
entries: Whether you hit or miss with the Goring Rush you can choose to intimdate the target.

entries.name: Languages
entries: Du kan tala, läsa och skriva på det gemensamma språket.

entries.name: Path of the Warrior
entries: +1 Strength. As a bonus action you can choose to mark someone up to 30ft. The person you challenge is the one you have to attack first, hit or miss on the target you are unbound to the challenge and can attack anyone else you may desire. The Death Mark grants you +Proficiency Bonus Damage to the marked target. Once per short rest, lasts for 10 mins. If the target dies within 10 mins the death mark fades.

entries.name: Path of the Righteous
entries: +1 Wisdom. Call upon the blessing of your God(s) - this grants you 1d8+Your Level HP, the amount of what you restore can go to one additional creature of your choice. This ability requires an action, once used you cannot use it again until a proper short rest or long rest.

entries.name: Path of the Tortured
entries: +1 Constitution. When you drop to 0 hit points and die, you drop a glowing red orb in your place. Using this orb, within 3 hours others can resurrect you with an Arcana check, with a DC of 19. After 3 hours, if you haven't been resurrected, the orb disappears and you are sent back to the Nine Hells. If they succeed, a vortex of fire appears around the orb that spans 15 feet in every direction for three turns. After three turns, the vortex disappears and you spawn with half of your hit points in its place, but losing 4 Ability Score Points of your choice until 1d4 weeks.

entries.name: Age
entries: Diamond Dogs reach adulthood at the age of 18 and can live up to 60 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Diamond Dogs typically live an evil greedy life, fighting eachother for whatever scraps that can gather.

entries.name: Size
entries: Diamond Dogs range from 4 to 6 feet tall. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Mile High Nose
entries: You gain advantage on perception while trying to smell creatures provided you know their scent before hand or it is a new scent you are unfamiliar with. If you are recalling a specific smell of a creature that you have encountered before you make a history check with advantage.

entries.name: Diamond Greed
entries: You are able to sniff out transmuted gems, illusory gems and you are able to pick out a person within 30ft of you who has a heavy purse.

entries.name: Bite
entries: You are proficient with your bite attack, which is a melee weapon attack that deals 1d6 piercing damage plus your Strength modifier.

entries.name: Languages
entries: Du kan tala, läsa och skriva på det gemensamma språket.

entries.name: Pack Master
entries: When an ally is within 5ft of you and the enemy attacks you you can choose to use your reaction to throw your ally in the way swapping places and the new target is the ally you swapped places with. The ally must be willing to swap places with you. Vice versa with your ally you can choose to throw yourself in the way. You may only do this twice per short or long rest.

entries.name: Born Predator
entries: If you surprise a creature and hit it with an attack on your first turn in combat, the attack deals an extra 2d6 damage to it. You can use this trait only once per combat.

entries.name: Pit Fighter
entries: Once per turn when you roll damage for a melee weapon attack, you can reroll the die and you must use the new roll.

entries.name: Age
entries: Dragons reach adulthood at the age of 48 and can live up to a millennium, though typically die off way before this from the King or other jealous Dragons.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Dragons are typically evil in nature, the King of the Dragons kills any Dragon who even seemingly looks like they're going for the throne.

entries.name: Size
entries: Dragons size ranges drastically from 4 to 7 feet tall, but have been known to be way bigger depending on age and hoard size. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Draconic Ancestry
entries: You have draconic ancestry. Choose one type of dragon from the Draconic Ancestry table. Your breath weapon and damage resistance are determined by the dragon type, as shown in the table.

entries.name: Breath Weapon
entries: You can use your action to exhale destructive energy. Your draconic ancestry determines the size, shape, and damage type of the exhalation.

When you use your breath weapon, each creature in the area of the exhalation must make a saving throw, the type of which is determined by your draconic ancestry. The DC for this saving throw equals 8 + your Constitution modifier + your proficiency bonus. A creature takes {@dice 2d6} damage on a failed save, and half as much damage on a successful one. The damage increases to {@dice 3d6} at 6th level, {@dice 4d6} at 11th level, and {@dice 5d6} at 16th level.
After you use your breath weapon, you can't use it again until you complete a short or long rest.

entries.name: Damage Resistance
entries: You have resistance to the damage type associated with your draconic ancestry.

entries.name: Natural Armor
entries: You have tough, scaly skin. When you aren't wearing armor, your AC is 11 + your Strength modifier. You can use your natural armor to determine your AC if the armor you wear would leave you with a lower AC. A shield's benefits apply as normal while you use your natural armor.

entries.name: Claws
entries: You grow retractable claws from the tips of your fingers. Extending or retracting the claws requires no action. The claws are natural weapons, which you can use to make unarmed strikes. If you hit with them, you deal slashing damage equal to 1d4 + your Strength modifier, instead of the normal bludgeoning damage for an unarmed strike.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read and write Draconic. Those who are a part of Celestial teachings can speak, read and write Common.

entries.name: Armor Plating
entries: You take 3 less damage from Bludgeoning, Piercing and Slashing from nonmagical attacks.

entries.name: Savage Being
entries: Gain the feat Savage Attacker

entries.name: Quickened Healing
entries: Whenever you take the Dodge action in combat, you can spend one Hit Die to heal yourself. Roll the die, add your Constitution modifier, and regain a number of hit points equal to the total (minimum of 1).

entries.name: Age
entries: Changelings reach adulthood at the age of 18 and can live up to 40 years.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Changelings are typically evil who feed off of other creatures for their emotions draining them in the process of all of their energy.

entries.name: Size
entries: Changelings range from 3 to 5 feet tall. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Unsettling Visage
entries: When a creature you can see makes an attack roll against you and you are disguised, you can use your reaction to impose disadvantage on the roll. You must use this feature before knowing whether the attack hits or misses. Using this trait reveals your shape shifting nature to any creature within 30 feet that can see you. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Change Apperance
entries: As an action, you can transform your appearance or revert to your natural form. You can't duplicate the appearance of a creature you've never seen, and you revert to your natural form if you die. You decide what you look like, including your height, weight, facial features, the sound of your voice, coloration, hair length, sex, and any other distinguishing characteristics. You can make yourself appear as a member of another race, though none of your game statistics change. You also can't appear as a creature of a different size than you, and your basic shape stays the same. Even to the most astute observers, your ruse is usually indiscernible. If you rouse suspicion, or if a wary creature suspects something is amiss, you have advantage on any Charisma (Deception) check you make to avoid detection. While using this ability it makes it makes a 20ft shimmering sound.

entries.name: Live by the Shell
entries: You live off of whatever the emotion the color of your shell is. As an action you can choose to a target up to 10 feet. That creature must make a Constitution Saving Throw against your DC of 8 + Proficiency bonus + Wisdom Modifier. If it fails it takes 1d8 Psychic damage and you gain temporary health points for the half of the damage dealt. On a successful save the target takes no damage. Fail or succeed you reveal yourself as a Changeling. You can only do this twice per short rest/long rest. This damage gains an addtional die at levels 7th, 14th, and 17th level. Additionally this counts as food for you for one full day

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read and write Changish and one other language of their choosing. Those who are a part of Celestial teachings can speak, read and write Common.

entries.name: Note
entries: The shell on the back of the changeling represent what hive they are from, and what emotion they feed off of.

intro: The color of the text represents the shell color and the hive you are from.

entries.name: Note
entries: Your role in the hive/when you were in the hive changes based on the Destiny Path.

entries.name: Hive Drone
entries: You have a burrow speed of 15ft and you are proficient with Mason's Tools.

entries.name: Praesidium Soldier
entries: You gain +1 AC but you can no longer fly and you are proficient in Athletics.

entries.name: Infiltrator
entries: When using your Change Apperance you do not make any sound. In addition you are proficient in persuasion or stealth.

entries.name: Age
entries: Alicorns reach adulthood at the age of 96 but it is unknown on just how long they live for, no Alicorn has died of old age, though it has been rumoured that they live up to hectocentennial years of age.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Alicorns typically create their own path, whether for good or evil. The best and the worst are found among them.

entries.name: Size
entries: Alicorns range from 4 to 8 feet tall. Regardless of your size, your size is medium.

entries.name: Note
entries: This is an {@b EXOTIC RACE} only use this with your DMs permission, these are much stronger races that need be approved before use.

entries.name: Magic Incarnate
entries: You learn two first level spells from the Wizard spell list. The two spells that you select can be casted once every long rest without expending a spell slot to do so.

entries.name: Reinforced Teachings
entries: You cast the two first level spells that you selected as a level 2 spell slot if they can be casted at higher levels. In doing so it still counts as a level 1 spell slot.

entries.name: Beyond Equine
entries: Your max ability score cap is increased by two. Making all ability scores capped at 22 instead of 20.

entries.name: Perfected Cutiemark
entries: You learn two languages of your choice or you can be expertised with one skill or tool of your choice.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read and write Common and Celestial

entries.name: Winds of Magic
entries: As an action you shape the winds of magic around you allowing each creature that you choose granting flyers an extra 30ft of movement speed, non-flyers sprout translucent magical wings granting them 25ft of flying speed and are allowed to wear heavy armor. Afterwards you suffer one level of exhaustion. You may activate this ability once per long rest. This effect lasts for 1 minuete.

entries.name: Aura of Destiny
entries: While within 15ft of you, yourself and others gain +2 to any ability and skill checks. Once per long rest you may give another creature or yourself temporary hit points equal to 2d4 + Character level.

entries.name: Archmage
entries: As an action you release a 30ft burst of magical energy, refueling everyones first level spell slots to the maximum allowed. Afterwards you suffer one level of exhaustion. You may activate this ability once per long rest.

entries.name: Age
entries: Queen Changelings reach adulthood at the age of 72 and can live up to a millennium.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Queen Changelings are evil by nature, feeding off of other creatures draining them of their life essence.

entries.name: Size
entries: Queen Changelings range from 4 to 8 feet tall. Regardless of your size, your size is medium.

entries.name: Note
entries: This is an {@b EXOTIC RACE} only use this with your DMs permission, these are much stronger races that need be approved before use.

entries.name: Unsettling Visage
entries: When a creature you can see makes an attack roll against you and you are disguised, you can use your reaction to impose disadvantage on the roll. You must use this feature before knowing whether the attack hits or misses. Using this trait reveals your shape shifting nature to any creature within 30 feet that can see you. Once you use this trait, you can't use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

entries.name: Change Appearance
entries: As an action, you can transform your appearance or revert to your natural form. You can't duplicate the appearance of a creature you've never seen, and you revert to your natural form if you die. You decide what you look like, including your height, weight, facial features, the sound of your voice, coloration, hair length, sex, and any other distinguishing characteristics. You can make yourself appear as a member of another race, though none of your game statistics change. You also can't appear as a creature of a different size than you, and your basic shape stays the same. Even to the most astute observers, your ruse is usually indiscernible. If you rouse suspicion, or if a wary creature suspects something is amiss, you have advantage on any Charisma (Deception) check you make to avoid detection. While using this ability it makes it makes a 20ft shimmering sound.

entries.name: Beyond Changeling
entries: Your max ability score cap is increased by two. Making all ability scores capped at 22 instead of 20.

entries.name: Pax Chrysalia
entries: You can see through any Changeling disguise automatically. Within 30ft of you if a Changeling takes damage you can choose to take the damage instead. Any Changeling from your hive can communicate telepathically with you from any distance and vice versa.

entries.name: Dux Aterna
entries: When a Changeling from your hive dies next to you you can choose to use your reaction to feed off of their emotions allowing you to use Live by the Shell on them which automatically succeeds.

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read and write Common, Sylvan and Changish

entries.name: Live by the Shell
entries: You live off of whatever the emotion the color of your shell is. As an action you can choose to a target up to 10 feet. That creature must make a Constitution Saving Throw against your DC of 10 + Proficiency bonus + Wisdom Modifier. If it fails it takes 2d8 Psychic damage and you gain temporary health points for the half of the damage dealt. On a successful save the target takes no damage. Fail or succeed you reveal yourself as a Changeling. You can only do this twice per short rest/long rest. This damage gains an addtional die at levels 7th, 14th, and 17th level. Additionally this counts as food for you for one full day.

intro: The color of the text represents the shell color and the hive you are from.

entries.name: Dead Wind
entries: As an action you can present an Artefact of pure negative energy preventing magic that is not from Changelings. Within a 30ft radius around you all concentration spells that are not from changelings fail any curse or magical effects also disappear. Magic items lose their magical properties until they leave the area. If a spell or magical effect goes into this aura it will fizzle out into nothing if it wasn't casted by a Changeling.  Non-Changeling flyers lose their ability to fly. This lasts for 1 minuete or until you lose concentration or end it on a bonus action.

entries.name: Polymorphing
entries: You learn the spell Polymorph, you may cast it only on yourself. You may use a 4th level spell slot to cast the spell if you have it, or you may use it twice before needing a long rest. This does not count against spells you already know if your class has limited spells

entries.name: Twisted Reality
entries: You can choose a target up to 30ft away from you, that creature must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw. The saving throw is 8 + spellcasting modifier + your proficiency. If the creature fails, it becomes enthralled by your Changeling magic, fighting for you for a minimum of three rounds. After those three rounds are over, they may take another Wisdom saving throw at advantage to resist the effects of this ability. This ability requires concentration and it can only be used once per long rest.

entries.name: Age
entries: Sirens reach adulthood at the age of 48 and have no known boundries for age. They look forever young and beautiful no matter the age.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Sirens are evil by nature, known to control others.

entries.name: Size
entries: Sirens range from 3 to 6 feet tall. Regardless of your size, your size is medium.

entries.name: Note
entries: This is an {@b EXOTIC RACE} only use this with your DMs permission, these are much stronger races that need be approved before use.

entries.name: Note
entries: Sirens can levitate up to 25ft off the ground in their Syro form, if there is ever a sudden gigantic fall those who levitate are under the effects of feather falling until they get to be 25ft off the ground.

entries.name: Sirens Voice
entries: You have proficiency in {@skill Performance} or {@skill Persuasion}.

entries.name: Emissasry of the Sea
entries: Aquatic beasts have an extraordinary affinity with your people. You can communicate simple ideas with beasts that can breathe water. They can understand the meaning of your words, though you have no special ability to understand them in return.

entries.name: Amphibious
entries: You can breathe air and water. You also have a swim speed equal to your movement speed while in Syro form.

entries.name: Voice of Transmission
entries: You learn the Primordial language, in addition you learn one additional language of your choosing.

entries.name: Syro Form
entries: As an action you can change to your Syro form. Syro form allows you to levitate at your movement speed at up to 25 feet off the ground or above water. At any point you may return to your pony form as an action.

entries.name: Languages
entries: Du kan tala, läsa och skriva på det gemensamma språket.

entries.name: Guardian of the Sea
entries: By being a Guardian of the Sea you gain the following:

items: {@b Guardians of the Depths:} Adapted to even the most extreme ocean depths, you have resistance to cold damage, and you ignore any of the drawbacks caused by a deep, underwater environment. In addition, you can sing even while underwater.
{@b Tireless Followers:} You may buff any number of creatures up to your Charisma Modifier, these creatures can move freely in water and can breathe underwater. Once per long rest, duration 5 mins.

{@b Control Water:} A child of the sea, you can call on the magic of elemental water. You can cast Shape Water.  Starting at 5th level and as Syro form, you can cast Wall of Water with it. Once you cast a spell with this trait, you can't cast that spell with it again until you finish a long rest. Charisma is your spellcasting ability for these spells, you do not need the material cost for these spells but when the spell ends the water vanishes unless you had the materials to do so.

entries.name: Entralling Master
entries: By being a Entralling Master you gain the following:

items: {@b Limited Telepathy:} You can telepathically speak to any creature you can see within 30 feet of you. You don't need to share a language with the creature for it to understand your telepathy, but it must be able to understand at least one language. This process of communication is slow and limited, allowing you to transmit and receive only simple ideas and straightforward concepts.
{@b Enthrall:} Starting at level 3 once per long rest you can cast Enthrall a target.

{@b Scales of Beauty:} Starting at level 5 and while in Syro form you can cast Hypnotic Pattern on yourself turning your scales into a Hypnotic Pattern. Hypnotic Pattern does not affect you, even if enemies are using it against you. These spells do not need material to cast, or spell slots, and can only be cast once per long rest.

entries.name: Age
entries: Ahuizotls reach adulthood at the age of 18 and can live up to under a century.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Most Ahuizotls tend to be neutral, they are greedy and do what they can to further themselves.

entries.name: Size
entries: Ahuiztol range from 5 to 7 feet tall. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Note
entries: This is an {@b EXOTIC RACE} only use this with your DMs permission, these are much stronger races that need be approved before use.

entries.name: Feline Eyes
entries: Thanks to your feline blood, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Three Arms
entries: You may weild a simple melee weapon that you are proficient with in your tails' hand. As a bonus action you may attack with it.

entries.name: Sneaky
entries: You are proficient in the {@skill Stealth} skill.

entries.name: Languages
entries: Du kan tala, läsa och skriva på det gemensamma språket.

entries.name: Tail Mastery
entries: You may now weild a martial melee weapon in your tail provided you are proficient with the weapon. As a bonus action you may attack with it. This is considered as a off-hand weapon.

entries.name: Bestial Attunement
entries: You may innately cast Animal Friendship and Find Familiar up to your INT modifier (minimum of 1) per long rest.

entries.name: Inescapable Grasp
entries: You have an additional reach of 5ft but while attacking in this range you lose your proficiency bonus on the attack.

entries.name: Age
entries: Sphinx reach adulthood at the age of 18 and can live up to under two centuries.

entries.name: Alignment
entries: Most Sphinx tend to be neutral, they seek knowledge to benefit themselves.

entries.name: Size
entries: Sphinx range from 4 to 6 feet tall. Your size is Medium.

entries.name: Note
entries: This is an {@b EXOTIC RACE} only use this with your DMs permission, these are much stronger races that need be approved before use.

entries.name: Feline Vision
entries: Thanks to your feline blood, you have superior vision in dark and dim conditions. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of gray.

entries.name: Claws
entries: Instead of an unarmed melee attack you can use your claws dealing 1d4 Slashing damage instead.

entries.name: Aura of the Desert
entries: As a bonus action you create a small sandstorm that encompasses you until the start of your next turn. Any creature within 5ft that attacks you must succeed a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or take disadvantage on the attack roll. You can use this feature twice per long rest.

entries.name: Gatekeeper
entries: Proficiency in {@skill Arcana} or {@skill Persuasion}.

entries.name: The 2nd Trial
entries: When a creature succeeds a saving throw against one of your spells or effects, you can force them to repeat it. The creature gains advantage on the second save and you can not force them to repeat any other saves for one day. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your wisdom modifier per long rest (Minimum 1).

entries.name: Languages
entries: You can speak, read and write Common and one of your choosing.

entries.name: Scarab Lord
entries: You have the find familiar spell to find yourself a beetle companion. Starting at 5th level and once per long rest you can use an action summon a Swarm of Beetles by your side who obey your command this lasts for 1 minute or until death before disappearing in a puff of sand.

entries.name: Play by My Rules
entries: You gain proficiency in intimidation. Once per short rest you can force a creature that can fly to make a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw.  On failure they can not fly for one minute. If they are in the air, they cease flying and fall to the ground, taking half the normal fall damage.

entries.name: Feline Grace
entries: You gain proficiency in acrobatics. Additionally, falls count as 20ft less for you and you do not land prone.
